title: Site Update: Eagler Launcher fork
notes: Forked eagler Launcher from Ampler launcher
Removed a not working version of eaglercraft

title: Site Update: Modded
description: Added news, bug fixes, and integrated mods!
notes: Added the mod screen, which allows users to select mods, and it'll be added to their eaglerforge launcher. Will override mods added in by user inside of launcher.
Added the news screen, it displays recent updates to the website, and launcher builds.
Fixed a bug of unable to scroll with to many launchers selected.

title: Site Update: Memorized
description: Organized/updated code, added memory options, more games, installations, usernames, and faq screen!
notes: Implemented memory for options selected inside of launcher.
Added wider range of game versions.
Added FAQ screen, answering common easy questions.
Removed bulk code for sleeker function/look.
Organize structure of project for future growth.

title: Eaglercraft 1.8.8
description: Eaglercraft 1.8.8 is released by lax1dude and aayunami2000

title: Site Update: W.A.S.M.
description: added the Webassembly GC editions of eaglercraft

title: Site Update: CYA CSS
description: Come back soon for full log!

title: Site Roadmap
description: Current progress on the future of Eagler Launcher!
notes: ✔ Rewrite some of the css and js

title: Ampler Launcher Release
description: this was when the orignal ampler launcher was released. eagler launcher is a fork of ampler launcher.
